00088 void DBG_SWOEnable(unsigned int location)
00089 {
00090   int port;
00091   int pin;
00092 
00093   EFM_ASSERT(location < AFCHANLOC_MAX);
00094 
00095 #if defined ( AF_DBG_SWO_PORT )
00096   port = AF_DBG_SWO_PORT(location);
00097   pin  = AF_DBG_SWO_PIN(location);
00098 #elif defined (AF_DBG_SWV_PORT )
00099   port = AF_DBG_SWV_PORT(location);
00100   pin  = AF_DBG_SWV_PIN(location);
00101 #else
00102 #warning "AF debug port is not defined."
00103 #endif
00104 
00105   /* Port/pin location not defined for device? */
00106   if ((pin < 0) || (port < 0))
00107   {
00108     EFM_ASSERT(0);
00109     return;
00110   }
00111 
00112   /* Ensure auxiliary clock going to the Cortex debug trace module is enabled */
00113   CMU_OscillatorEnable(cmuOsc_AUXHFRCO, true, false);
00114 
00115   /* Set selected pin location for SWO pin and enable it */
00116   GPIO_DbgLocationSet(location);
00117   GPIO_DbgSWOEnable(true);
00118 
00119   /* Configure SWO pin for output */
00120   GPIO_PinModeSet((GPIO_Port_TypeDef)port, pin, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00121 }
00122 #endif
00123 
00126 #endif /* defined( CoreDebug_DHCSR_C_DEBUGEN_Msk ) */
